title: Teresa Palmer in Oz Mystery Series 'The Last Anniversary' Full Trailer
description: "A woman has to save herself however she can. A woman has to be resourceful. Always." Indeed. AMC has revealed an official trailer for The Last Anniversary, an original series made in Australia streaming this spring on AMC+ in the US. It is a mystery that touches on family matters, motherhood and those women whose legacy defines the generations that blossom after them. "Every family has their secrets." It's based on Liane Moriarty's novel of the same name - this will be out streaming in the US at the end of March. Sophie inherits a house on Scribbly Gum Island, left to her by her ex-boyfriend's great-aunt Connie, however, the island has many secrets. After the unwelcome reception she receives on arrival, she begins to investigate the mysteries of the island and finds herself drawn into a complex web of long-held family secrets spanning three generations of women, uncovering far more than ever expected. The series stars Teresa Palmer as Sophie Honeywell, along with Miranda Richardson, Danielle Macdonald, Helen Thomson, Susan Prior, Claude Scott-Mitchell, Charlie Garber, and Uli Latukefu. Of course this is being marketed like a scary true crime series, because that's the only way you can get people […]
author: Alex Billington

text: by March 10, 2025Source: YouTube "A woman has to save herself however she can. A woman has to be resourceful. Always." Indeed. AMC has revealed an official trailer for The Last Anniversary, an original series made in Australia streaming this spring on AMC+ in the US. It is a mystery that touches on family matters, motherhood and those women whose legacy defines the generations that blossom after them. "Every family has their secrets." It's based on Liane Moriarty's novel of the same name - this will be out streaming in the US at the end of March. Sophie inherits a house on Scribbly Gum Island, left to her by her ex-boyfriend's great-aunt Connie, however, the island has many secrets. After the unwelcome reception she receives on arrival, she begins to investigate the mysteries of the island and finds herself drawn into a complex web of long-held family secrets spanning three generations of women, uncovering far more than ever expected. The series stars Teresa Palmer as Sophie Honeywell, along with Miranda Richardson, Danielle Macdonald, Helen Thomson, Susan Prior, Claude Scott-Mitchell, Charlie Garber, and Uli Latukefu. Of course this is being marketed like a scary true crime series, because that's the only way you can get people into watching anything nowadays. Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for AMC+'s series The Last Anniversary, direct from YouTube: The Last Anniversary is set on the remote, but beautiful Scribbly Gum Island, a place of many secrets. The one that made it famous — the disappearance of a couple decades ago — might have made the island a destination for true crime tourists, but when Sophie Honeywell inherits a house on the island, it’s the fresh start she’s craving. After the unwelcome reception she receives on arrival, she begins to investigate the mysteries of the island and finds herself drawn into a complex web of long-held family secrets spanning 3 generations of women, uncovering far more than ever expected. The Last Anniversary is a series created by Australian writer Samantha Strauss, known for Dance Academy, Nine Perfect Strangers. With writing by Samantha Strauss, Sara L. Walker, Giula Sandler, Greg Waters. Adapted from the novel of the same name written by Liane Moriarty. All six episodes are directed by John Polson. It's made by Fifth Season, Made Up Stories, and Blossom Films. Executive produced by Lana Greenhalgh, Alison Hubert-Burns, Steve Hutensky, Nicole Kidman, Jodi Matterson, Liane Moriarty, Bruna Papandrea, John Polson, Per Saari, and Samantha Strauss. AMC releases The Last Anniversary series streaming on AMC+ in the US on March 30th, 2025. Find more posts in: Streaming, To Watch, Trailer
html:
by
March 10, 2025
Source: YouTube

"A woman has to save herself however she can. A woman has to be resourceful. Always." Indeed. AMC has revealed an official trailer for The Last Anniversary, an original series made in Australia streaming this spring on AMC+ in the US. It is a mystery that touches on family matters, motherhood and those women whose legacy defines the generations that blossom after them. "Every family has their secrets." It's based on Liane Moriarty's novel of the same name - this will be out streaming in the US at the end of March. Sophie inherits a house on Scribbly Gum Island, left to her by her ex-boyfriend's great-aunt Connie, however, the island has many secrets. After the unwelcome reception she receives on arrival, she begins to investigate the mysteries of the island and finds herself drawn into a complex web of long-held family secrets spanning three generations of women, uncovering far more than ever expected. The series stars Teresa Palmer as Sophie Honeywell, along with Miranda Richardson, Danielle Macdonald, Helen Thomson, Susan Prior, Claude Scott-Mitchell, Charlie Garber, and Uli Latukefu. Of course this is being marketed like a scary true crime series, because that's the only way you can get people into watching anything nowadays.

Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for AMC+'s series The Last Anniversary, direct from YouTube:

The Last Anniversary is set on the remote, but beautiful Scribbly Gum Island, a place of many secrets. The one that made it famous — the disappearance of a couple decades ago — might have made the island a destination for true crime tourists, but when Sophie Honeywell inherits a house on the island, it’s the fresh start she’s craving. After the unwelcome reception she receives on arrival, she begins to investigate the mysteries of the island and finds herself drawn into a complex web of long-held family secrets spanning 3 generations of women, uncovering far more than ever expected. The Last Anniversary is a series created by Australian writer Samantha Strauss, known for Dance Academy, Nine Perfect Strangers. With writing by Samantha Strauss, Sara L. Walker, Giula Sandler, Greg Waters. Adapted from the novel of the same name written by Liane Moriarty. All six episodes are directed by John Polson. It's made by Fifth Season, Made Up Stories, and Blossom Films. Executive produced by Lana Greenhalgh, Alison Hubert-Burns, Steve Hutensky, Nicole Kidman, Jodi Matterson, Liane Moriarty, Bruna Papandrea, John Polson, Per Saari, and Samantha Strauss. AMC releases The Last Anniversary series streaming on AMC+ in the US on March 30th, 2025.

Find more posts in: Streaming, To Watch, Trailer
